task.title: Install a Game
task.shortdesc: Before you can play your new Steam game, you have to install it onto your computer.

taskbody.prereq: Make sure at least one of your storage drives has sufficient storage space for the game you wish to download.

step.cmd: In the left panel, select the game you want to install.
Check whether or not to create a desktop and start menu shortcut for the game.
Select a storage drive with sufficient space.
Click Install. How long it takes to download will depend on the size of the game and your internet speed. You will receive a notification on the bottom right of your screen once it is done.
